name: Invigorating Kitty Meal
desc: This main dish looks rather cute. With Kiminami Anna's help, this dish was made with the tastes of provisional head priestess Neko in mind. Although it does not quite match the flavor that Hibiki used to produce, Lady Neko seems rather pleased with your work nonetheless. Due to the lack of spices, humans might find this dish a tad on the plain side.

customize.name: Recipe: Invigorating Kitty Meal
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making an Invigorating Kitty Meal.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Seagrass
customize.desc: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

customize.name: Rice
customize.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

customize.name: Delicious Invigorating Kitty Meal
customize.desc: This main dish looks rather cute. The simple methodology used to make it has maximized flavor retention in its ingredients. Even cats who usually pay humdrum humanity little mind will surely come running over when they catch a whiff of this. Uh, wait a moment. Was this supposed to attract dogs, too?

customize.name: Suspicious Invigorating Kitty Meal
customize.desc: This main dish looks rather cute. However, its appearance betrays a lack of experience in the making, with the final product being every bit the hastily thrown together slapdash job. Who knows if the provisional head priestess Neko will accept this...

customize.name: Kirara
customize.desc: A courier for Komaniya Express, a delivery company in Inazuma. A nekomata who loves her job and human society.

customize.name: Energizing Bento
customize.desc: Kirara's specialty. A human-friendly bento box Kirara put in a great deal of effort to prepare. By observing the preferences of human girls, she came up with this combination of well-balanced side dishes and adorable cat-shaped rice balls. It's just like a carefully wrapped package... You could receive one every day and never get tired of it!

value.text: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.
